name: (re)wind me up
description:
a turn-based strategy game about getting back to the toy chest

made for brackeys game jam 2020.2

rules:

  • your goal is to reach the purple
  • every turn you gain one charge
  • with a charge you can:
    • move one space to an empty adjacent tile (1 charge)
    • attack an adjacent enemy (2 charges)
  • each turn you can (re)wind up, where you forfeit your move but gain an extra charge
  • watch out! if an enemy is next to you on a turn they can kill you

good luck!

controls:

  • w, a, s, d or arrow keys to move
  • to attack press the attack button + an arrow key (wasd)
  • e to see the whole map
  • p to pass your turn
  • q to go back to level select
  • r to reset the level

more info:

made in a week for the brackeys game jam 2020.2

made in unity

sfx by leshy sfx maker

music made in bosca ceoil

art made in krita

fonts:
dogica
baby blocks
